title: Smart Data Models - ExternalNetworkInjection
description: Adapted from CIM data models. This class represents external network and it is used for IEC 60909 calculations.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be ExternalNetworkInjection

governorSCD.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Power Frequency Bias. This is the change in power injection divided by the change in frequency and negated.  A positive value of the power frequency bias provides additional power injection upon a drop in frequency. Default: 0.0

ikSecond.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Indicates whether initial symmetrical short-circuit current and power have been calculated according to IEC (Ik`). Default: False

maxInitialSymShCCurrent.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum initial symmetrical short-circuit currents (Ik` max) in A (Ik` = Sk`/(SQRT(3) Un)). Used for short circuit data exchange according to IEC 60909 Default: 0.0

maxP.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum active power of the injection. Default: 0.0

maxQ.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Not for short circuit modelling; It is used for modelling of infeed for load flow exchange. If maxQ and minQ are not used ReactiveCapabilityCurve can be used Default: 0.0

maxR0ToX0Ratio.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum ratio of zero sequence resistance of Network Feeder to its zero sequence reactance (R(0)/X(0) max). Used for short circuit data exchange according to IEC 60909 Default: 0.0

maxR1ToX1Ratio.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum ratio of positive sequence resistance of Network Feeder to its positive sequence reactance (R(1)/X(1) max). Used for short circuit data exchange according to IEC 60909 Default: 0.0

maxZ0ToZ1Ratio.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum ratio of zero sequence impedance to its positive sequence impedance (Z(0)/Z(1) max). Used for short circuit data exchange according to IEC 60909 Default: 0.0

minInitialSymShCCurrent.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum initial symmetrical short-circuit currents (Ik` min) in A (Ik` = Sk`/(SQRT(3) Un)). Used for short circuit data exchange according to IEC 60909 Default: 0.0

minP.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum active power of the injection. Default: 0.0

minQ.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Not for short circuit modelling; It is used for modelling of infeed for load flow exchange. If maxQ and minQ are not used ReactiveCapabilityCurve can be used Default: 0.0

minR0ToX0Ratio.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Indicates whether initial symmetrical short-circuit current and power have been calculated according to IEC (Ik`). Used for short circuit data exchange according to IEC 6090 Default: 0.0

minR1ToX1Ratio.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum ratio of positive sequence resistance of Network Feeder to its positive sequence reactance (R(1)/X(1) min). Used for short circuit data exchange according to IEC 60909 Default: 0.0

minZ0ToZ1Ratio.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum ratio of zero sequence impedance to its positive sequence impedance (Z(0)/Z(1) min). Used for short circuit data exchange according to IEC 60909 Default: 0.0

p.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Active power injection. Load sign convention is used, i.e. positive sign means flow out from a node. Starting value for steady state solutions. Default: 0.0

q.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Reactive power injection. Load sign convention is used, i.e. positive sign means flow out from a node. Starting value for steady state solutions. Default: 0.0

referencePriority.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Priority of unit for use as powerflow voltage phase angle reference bus selection. 0 = don t care (default) 1 = highest priority. 2 is less than 1 and so on. Default: 0

voltageFactor.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage factor in pu, which was used to calculate short-circuit current Ik` and power Sk`. Default: 0.0
